TRASHBIN_DESCRIPTION: Ukuthatha okunamandla nesimanje kwesandiso sokuqala sika-Trashbin
BACKUP_SAVE_FAILED: Yehlulekile ukulondoloza ikhophi yasenqolobaneni, zama ukukopisha okuqukethwe komgqomo kadoti ebhodini lokunamathisela futhi udale isipele mathupha.
BACKUP_RESTORE_FAILED: Yehlulekile ukubuyisela isipele, zama ukungenisa okuqukethwe komgqomo kadoti efayelini mathupha.
BACKUP_FILE_READ_FAILED: Yehlulekile ukufunda ifayela, sicela uqinisekise ukuthi liyifayela le-JSON elivumelekile.
SETTINGS_RESHUFFLE_ON_SKIP: Yeqela kokuthi Okulandelayo Okungalahli Kadoti Nokushintsha Kabusha
ITEMS_EMPTY_SONGS:
Azikho izingoma ezilahliwe!
Izingoma ozengeza kudoti zizovela lapha.
ITEMS_EMPTY_ARTISTS:
Abekho abaculi abalahliwe!
Abaculi obangezayo kudoti bazovela lapha.
DESCRIPTION_COPY: Kopisha zonke izinto ezikudoti ebhodini lokunamathisela.
DESCRIPTION_EXPORT: Londoloza zonke izinto ku-trashbin kufayela le-.json.
DESCRIPTION_IMPORT: Bhala phezu kwazo zonke izinto ku-trashbin usebenzisa ifayela le-.json.
DESCRIPTION_SETTINGS_ENABLED: Master toggle to enable or disable all Trashbin+ functionality
DESCRIPTION_SETTINGS_SHOW_WIDGET: Display a trash icon in the playback bar next to the currently playing track for quick access
DESCRIPTION_SETTINGS_AUTOPLAY: Automatically start playing music when Spotify opens or the extension loads
DESCRIPTION_SETTINGS_QUEUE_TRASHBIN: Add trash icons next to each song in your upcoming queue for easy management
DESCRIPTION_SETTINGS_TRACKLIST_TRASHBIN: Add trash icons next to songs in album and playlist views for quick filtering
DESCRIPTION_SETTINGS_RESHUFFLE_ON_SKIP: When skipping a trashed song, automatically jump to the next non-trashed track in the queue
DESCRIPTION_SETTINGS_PLAYLIST_MONITOR: Automatically recover from Spotify playback glitches by resuming your last playlist
